links.title: Apple Might Be Losing Its Bull Power
links.description: Apple shares reached a new high last month after its share price dropped heavily in 2014. $AAPL has unarguably maintained a bullish trend over the years. In August, $AAPL reached $1 trillion in market value, the first company in the U.S. to achieve that.

Nvidia's iPhone-Like Strategy for Growing Graphics Chip Sales Could Pay Off

$SSNLF $NVDA $AAPL $INTC $AMD

https://www.thestreet.com/opinion/nvidia-iphone-graphics-chip-strategy-could-pay-off-14717715

links.title: Nvidia's iPhone-like strategy for growing graphics chip sales could pay off
links.description: Much like Apple ( AAPL) with the iPhone, Nvidiaseems intent on growing average selling prices (ASPs) for its PC gaming GPUs. Judging by initial reviews for Nvidia's latest high-end gaming GPUs, and by where the competition stands today, the company has a decent chance of making its pricing strategy pay off.

messages.body:
More Alexa Devices Are Coming -- Here's What That Could Mean for Amazon's Stock

$GOOG $GOOGL $AAPL $SONO $AMZN  

https://www.thestreet.com/technology/more-amazon-alexa-echo-devices-coming-14717728

links.title: More Alexa devices are coming -- here's what that could mean for Amazon's stock
links.description: Alexa is about to be everywhere. Amazon is reportedly set to release eight new devices that will expand its voice-assistant technology, Alexa, beyond Amazon's existing family of 11 smart speakers plus numerous other devices for the home that are compatible with Alexa. Ever had the urge to heat up leftover pasta using your voice?

links.title: Are We Headed For A Passive Index Meltdown?
links.description: Guess who said the following quote: "If everybody indexed, the only word you could use is chaos, catastrophe. The markets would fail." The speaker, believe it or not, is John Bogle, founder of Vanguard, which has been at the forefront of indexing.
